import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a comment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/comment"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a comment in a file with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","description":"The file ID where the comment is located.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The parameters for updating a comment.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["version"],"type":"object","properties":{"version":{"type":"integer","description":"The comment version.","format":"int32","example":1234},"comment":{"type":"string","description":"The comment text.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The parameters for updating a comment.","title":"UpdateComment"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated comment","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"string"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"StringWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
